summary: The team discussed project planning and value streams, focusing on timeline management and implementation approaches. They reviewed a Github portfolio/imagery showing different value streams including intake, credit, docs funding, servicing and collections. The discussion centered around project estimation accuracy and implementation strategy.
key_topics: Value streams and mini projects review
Project implementation approaches (MVP vs full rollout)
decisions: Different approaches needed for different components - MVP approach for new features, but not suitable for data model
T-shirt sizing estimates are directionally correct but not precise
action_items: Review and potentially revise project timelines
Evaluate possibility of doing fewer simultaneous projects
concerns: Difficulty in managing timelines and cost expectations
Possible 50% margin of error in estimates
Higher complexity and risk of failure with longer timelines
Unclear reasons for extended project durations
michael_priorities: Getting better clarity on timeline and cost expectations
commitments: Team will be thoughtful about which implementation approach to take for different components
Will focus on being protective against potential project risks
